name: harebnb
description: Welcome to HareBnB, a vacation booking service designed specifically for bunnies and rabbits (and their humans)! Our platform allows users to search for and book bunny and rabbit-friendly properties, or list their own property for others to rent. With a user-friendly interface and a wide range of options to choose from, HareBnB makes it easy for bunny and rabbit lovers to find the perfect vacation spot. Whether you're looking to rent out your bunny-approved home or searching for the perfect getaway, HareBnB has you covered.

scripts.install: npm --prefix backend install backend && npm --prefix frontend install frontend
